thread.section_title: GoGetFunding Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoGetFunding | gogetfunding.com
thread.title: Neal G Brownell
thread.title_full: GoGetFunding reviewed by Neal G Brownell

author: Neal G Brownell
title: Neal G Brownell
text: Amanda Bizzinotto at GoGetFunding.com was so helpful in aiding us in the set-up of our campaign. My wife and I are not very technologically savvy and when we ran into problems Amanda always responded with some assistance and didn't mind us asking question after question. The biggest problem we had was linking our video to our campaign. Amanda told us how to send her a screen shot of our YouTube page and guided us through until she got it up and running on our campaign. Amanda is an example of what customer service should be in all areas.
